```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(icesTAF)
library(jsonlite)
library(glue)

# read in config
config <- read_json("config.json")

# read in data
ecoregion_table <- read.taf("bootstrap/data/ecoregion_table.csv")

# get ecoregion shape
ecoregion_name <-
  ecoregion_table$Description[ecoregion_table$Key == config$ecoregion]
```

![](report/effort_maps.png)

```{r effort_plot, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
label_1 <-
"**Figure X** Spatial distribution of average annual fishing effort
 (mW fishing hours) in the {ecoregion_name} during
 {config$year - 3}-{config$year}, by gear type. Fishing effort data are
 only shown for vessels >12 m having vessel monitoring systems (VMS)."

cat(glue(gsub("\n", "", label_1)))
```

![](report/surface_sar.png)
![](report/subsurface_sar.png)

```{r sar_plot, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
label_2 <-
"**Figure X** Average annual subsurface (left) and surface (right) disturbance by
 mobile bottom contacting fishing gear
 ({paste(unlist(config$gears), collapse = ', ')}) in the
 {ecoregion_name} during {config$year - 3}-{config$year}, expressed as
 average swept area ratios (SAR)."

cat(glue(gsub("\n", "", label_2)))
```
